text.section:
A preference does not include a transfer:
To the extent that such transfer was a substantially contemporaneous exchange for new value given to the bank; or
To the extent that such transfer was made in payment of a debt incurred in the ordinary course of the bank's business made not later than forty-five (45) days after such debt was incurred.

law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 324, sec. 48, effective July 13, 1984.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2006). In accordance with 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 247, secs. 38 and 39, this statute has been renumbered as a section of the Kentucky Financial Services Code, KRS Chapter 286, and KRS references within this statute have been adjusted to conform with the 2006 renumbering of that code.
